pr_title: CB-5868 No suitable subnet found as there were neither private nor an…

timeline.author: lacikaaa

replies.bodyText: What do you mean by else? You mean, fallback strategy? That you will find at SubnetIdProvider or at SubnetChooser, as they do different things on fallback (does this answer your question?)
replies.author: gergopapi2

replies.bodyText: you have an if, and this is the else part. makes the code easier to read if you don't have hidden returns
replies.author: lacikaaa

replies.bodyText: I am not sure I agree. I think this is opinion based, as some like single returns, whereas others prefer early returns. I personally think there is value in early returns as it avoids nesting and gives a clear flow to the code.
replies.author: gergopapi2

timeline.message: CB-5868 No suitable subnet found as there were neither private nor any suitable public subnets
CB-5868 No suitable subnet found as there were neither private nor any suitable public subnets

timeline.bodyText: a bit strange that logresult returns
timeline.author: lacikaaa

replies.bodyText: Yes, thanks for pointing that out! I added it.
